entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 12 with temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending early this morning then clearing. Wind northeast 40 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 12 with temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
